item.title: Update Mailersend.com offer in README.md
item.description: https://www.mailersend.com - Email API, SMTP, 3,000 emails/month free for transactional emails

item.title: add 2 comment services
item.description:
https://www.remarkbox.com/ - Open source hosted comments platform ,pay what you can for "One moderator on a few domains with complete control over behavior & appearance"
https://intensedebate.com/ - A feature-rich comment system for WordPress, Tumblr, Blogger and many other website platforms.

item.title: add 4 services
item.description:
https://www.webex.com/ - Video meetings with a free plan offering 40 minutes per meeting with 100 attendees.
https://www.ringcentral.com/ - Video meetings with a free plan offering 50 minutes per meeting with 100 participants.
https://whereby.com/ - Video meetings:1 room,100 attendees per meeting,Unlimited one-on-one meetings,Group meetings for up to 45 minutes;Video call API:2000 participant minutes monthly
https://www.metered.ca/ - Free TURN server with 50GB included monthly TURN usage.

item.title: update connectycube ,remove push technology
item.description: https://connectycube.com - Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 1000 users.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.moesif.com/ - Monetization](https://www.moesif.com/) - Generate revenue from APIs via usage-based billing. Connect to Stripe, Chargebee, etc. Free tier offers 30,000 events/month.

item.title: Update README.md (#1)
item.description: https://pixee.ai - Automated Product Security Engineer as a free GitHub bot that submits PRs to your java code base to automatically resolve vulnerabilities. Other languages coming soon!

item.title: add ipbase
item.description: https://ipbase.com - IP Geolocation API - Forever free plan that spans 150 requests per month.
